subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: It was not until an injury sidelined her in 2005 that South Korean golfer Se Ri Pak was able to stand back and admire her body of work, and see herself as others did, as a pioneer.
snippet: It was not until an injury sidelined her in 2005 that South Korean golfer Se Ri Pak was able to stand back and admire her body of work, and see herself as others did, as a pioneer.
